title: Global distribution systems : company revenues 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Revenue in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Company Amadeus has the highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars and Travelport has the lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars.
The difference of Revenue in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Company is 3.36.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Revenue in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Company Amadeus and lowest at Company Travelport.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Revenue in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Company Amadeus has the highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars and Travelport has the lowest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars.
The difference of Revenue in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Company is 3.36.
max_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Revenue in billion U.S. dollars in each Company on the y axis.
The Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Company Amadeus and lowest at Company Travelport.
The Revenue in billion U.S. dollars of Company Travelport is 2.37% smaller than the maximum value at Amadeus.
Considered together, the average Revenue in billion U.S. dollars in all 3 Companys is roughly 3.95.
The Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is 11.86 if we add up values of all Companys.
